chart.title: Obesity in adults
chart.subtitle: Estimated prevalence of [obesity](#dod:obesity), based on general population surveys and statistical modeling. Obesity is a [risk factor](#dod:risk-factor) for chronic complications, including cardiovascular disease, and premature death.
